name: Petra Design
slogan: Fashion brand of high performance sportswear made in Italy
description: Fashion Sportswear. This really sums it up in two words. Think about fashion designers who are now launching their line of sportswear: Looks great but lacks functionality. What about technical or outdoor apparel brands? highly performant, but lack in style. So why not design with function and form in mind and, most importantly, create a branding that is associated with fashion? Iconic pieces, that last in time; Garments that will do anything you want at the gym and still make a fashion statement. From experience in social media and fashion, the brand was carefully created from the ground up, and the next step is to turn it into a Hype brand, but I cannot do it alone! That's why I need you. The important thing is to always sell a story not just a product. And the story doesn't get any more authentic than Petra Design's story! Each collection is sold online and promoted on social media and through genuine press. Once again, the way of the future.
